txt.en: 'Just a few more nails over here... a board over there... a patch on this spot...'
'If we are going to hang this back on, I am going to need help.'
'I have no idea how to fix this.'
'Have we figured out how we are going to get this back out into the Water-works?'
'We are going to need more materials and more workers.'
'I hope the guards get rid of everything infesting the water down there before we finish our repairs.'
'Wait... maybe if we... no, nevermind, that is not going to work.'
'I think this side is starting to look pretty good.'
'There are some rotted boards here we will need to replace once we get supplies.'
